item.description:
For those people who can get out of work a bit early, and get to Community Boating by 5:30 or so, we can go sailing on weekdays.

If people are up for it, we can then go for dinner or beers some place nearby afterwards. Sail from 5:30-7:30 or so, then dinner/beers.

This will be on some weekday of either the week of Monday, May 20, or the week of Monday, May 27. I'll pick a date later, based on weather forecasts. No sailing for a couple of weeks after this, as I'll be out of town.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Sail on the Charles IV (weekday edition)
